title: Fresh rounded sans in use
content:
Hi,  
I’m looking for examples of rounded contemporary typefaces in use, either from the web, printed matter, signage, your holiday photos, whatever (e.g. General Electric identity, Thisnext.com website, Telewest identity (rip), images of Bryant in use from Process).  
Typefaces suggestions are welcomed but not really necessary since I already made a good list of them. Now I’m looking for images to support my font researches with something real and concrete.  
You know, a pdf specimen is rarely enough to persuade a client of a good typeface!  
Thank you all!

 [‹ The best typeface you can think of...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163616/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37169 "Go to previous forum topic") [A-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-gh!!! Me Maties! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163616/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37246 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Giacomo Cesana

comments.content:
[Bryant in use](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163616/http:/del.icio.us/stewf/font:Bryant)  
 [type trends of the new web](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163616/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/mar2006_b/)  
 [logos of web 2.0](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163616/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/the-logos-of-web-20/)

The great book [Hand Job](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163616/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/redirect.html?ie=UTF8&location=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FHand-Job-Catalog-Michael-Perry%2Fdp%2F1568986262%2F&tag=typographica-20&linkCode=ur2&camp=1789&creative=9325) just published by Princeton Architectural Press is set in Bryant.

Stephen, nice idea to bookmarks web pages by the font in use... I hope you don’t mind if I borrow it for my bookmarks too!  
And thank you for the help.

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven
